lyric:
[by:Trap_Girl]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Shawn Mendes/Camila Cabello/Andrew Wotman/Benjamin Levin/Ali Tamposi/Charlotte Emma Aitchison/Jack Patterson/Magnus August Höiberg
[00:01.000] 作词 : Shawn Mendes/Camila Cabello/Andrew Wotman/Benjamin Levin/Ali Tamposi/Charlotte Emma Aitchison/Jack Patterson/Magnus August Höiberg
[00:12.22]Camila Cabello：
[00:15.29]I love it when you call me Señorita
[00:19.36]I wish I could pretend I didn't need ya
[00:23.43]But every touch is ooh la la la
[00:26.54]It's true la la la
[00:28.51]Ooh I should be runnin'
[00:30.57]Ooh you keep me coming for ya
[00:32.95]Shawn Mendes：
[00:33.29]Land in miami
[00:35.22]The air was hot from summer rain
[00:37.27]Sweat dripping off me
[00:39.44]Before I even knew her name la la la
[00:44.41]It felt like ooh la la la
[00:47.07]Yeah noo
[00:49.47]Sapphire moonlight
[00:51.50]We danced for hours in the sand
[00:53.65]Tequila sunrise
[00:55.71]Her body fit right in my hands la la la
[01:00.85]It felt like ooh la la la yeah
[01:04.28]Both：
[01:04.47]I love it when you call me Señorita
[01:08.54]I wish I could pretend I didn't need ya
[01:12.64]But every touch is ooh la la la
[01:15.76]It's true la la la
[01:17.86]Ooh I should be runnin'
[01:19.85]Oohh you know I love it when you call me Señorita
[01:25.05]I wish it wasn't so d**n hard to leave ya
[01:29.12]But every touch is ooh la la la
[01:32.26]It's true la la la
[01:34.16]Ooh I should be runnin'
[01:36.18]Ooh you keep me coming for ya
[01:38.54]Camila Cabello：
[01:38.86]Locked in the hotel
[01:40.86]There's just somethings that never change
[01:42.92]You say we're just friends
[01:44.92]But friends don't know the way you taste la la la
[01:50.63]God knows it's been a long time coming don't ya let me fall ooh
[01:54.50]Both：
[01:55.08]Hooked on your lips undress me
[01:57.03]Hooked on your tongue
[01:58.99]Oh I love your kiss is deadly don't stop
[02:02.11]I love it when you call me Señorita
[02:06.04]I wish I could pretend I didn't need ya
[02:10.04]But every touch is ooh la la la
[02:13.11]It's true la la la
[02:15.21]Ooh I should be runnin'
[02:17.23]Ooh you know I love it when you call me Señorita
[02:22.42]I wish it wasn't so d**n hard to leave ya
[02:26.48]But every touch is ooh la la la
[02:29.60]It's true la la la
[02:31.61]Ooh I should be runnin'
[02:33.68]Ooh you keep me coming for ya
[02:37.44]All along I've been coming for ya
[02:40.31]For you
[02:41.70]And I hope it means something to you
[02:45.75]Call my name I'll be coming for ya
[02:48.36]Coming for ya
[02:49.42]Calling for ya
[02:50.50]Coming for ya
[02:51.81]For ya
[02:55.80]For ya
[02:57.87]Oh she loves it when I call her
[02:59.94]For ya
[03:04.55]Ooh I should be runnin'
[03:06.51]Ooh you keep me coming for ya
tlyric:
[by:咆哮的小清新___]
[00:12.22]
[00:15.29]我爱你称我为"我的小姐"时的样子
[00:19.36]多希望我可以假装不需要你
[00:23.43]但每一次触碰都妙不可语
[00:26.54]真实无比 lalala
[00:28.51]噢 我想我应该逃走
[00:30.57]噢但你却将我牢牢吸引掌控
[00:32.95]
[00:33.29]着陆在迈阿密
[00:35.22]盛夏雨季的空气炙热难息
[00:37.27]汗流不停
[00:39.44]在我知道她的名字之前就汗流不停
[00:44.41]那感觉就像 噢
[00:47.07]
[00:49.47]午夜里的蓝宝石璀璨不息
[00:51.50]你我在沙滩上久久共舞
[00:53.65]配上龙舌兰日出
[00:55.71]她的身躯线条刚好适合你的手掌一握
[01:00.85]那感觉一如 噢妙不可语
[01:04.28]
[01:04.47]我爱你称我为"我的小姐"时的样子
[01:08.54]多希望我可以假装不需要你
[01:12.64]但每一次触碰都妙不可语
[01:15.76]真实无比 lalala
[01:17.86]噢 我想我应该逃走
[01:19.85]但你知道你称我为"我的小姐"时我有多么享受
[01:25.05]多希望我可以轻易就离开你
[01:29.12]但每一次触碰都妙不可语
[01:32.26]真实无比 lalala
[01:34.16]噢 我想我应该逃走
[01:36.18]噢但你却将我牢牢吸引掌控
[01:38.54]
[01:38.86]把自己锁在房间里
[01:40.86]始终有一些无法改变的事情
[01:42.92]你说我们只是朋友
[01:44.92]但朋友又怎么知道你有多么可口
[01:50.63]你知道我们也这样维持了许久 别让我失望难过
[01:54.50]
[01:55.08]当你的双唇将我衣裳剥落
[01:57.03]噢在你舌尖沦陷的我
[01:58.99]噢亲爱的 你的吻教人销魂 别停下来
[02:02.11]我爱你称我为"我的小姐"时的样子
[02:06.04]多希望我可以假装不需要你
[02:10.04]但每一次触碰都妙不可语
[02:13.11]但每一次触碰都真实无比 lalala
[02:15.21]噢 我想我应该逃走
[02:17.23]但你知道你称我为"我的小姐"时我有多么享受
[02:22.42]希望我可以轻易就离开你
[02:26.48]但每一次触碰都妙不可语
[02:29.60]真实无比 lalala
[02:31.61]噢 我想我应该逃走
[02:33.68]噢但你却将我牢牢吸引掌控
[02:37.44]一直以来我都那么戒不掉你
[02:40.31]为你
[02:41.70]希望那对你来说有所意义
[02:45.75]我会随叫随到只要你呼唤我名
[02:48.36]只为你(我到来时她总是无比欣喜)
[02:49.42]只为你
[02:50.50]只为你
[02:51.81]只为你
[02:55.80]只为你
[02:57.87](我到来时她总是无比欣喜)
[02:59.94]只为你
[03:04.55]噢我想我应该逃走
[03:06.51]但你却将我牢牢吸引掌控
